summary: Blue Daedric weapon re-texture and glow replacer. I made this with the Gimp to accompany my Daedric Blue Light Armor / texture replacer, and may also use it in my mod 'A Friend of Time'.
descriptionHtml:
*By request!
*No Performance impact! (Since the texture files are the same size as original).

This mod does two things. You can choose one or both:

1) Daedric Blue Weapons - Standalone includes an esp that lets you craft and upgrade Daedric Blue Weapons (with the Daedric Smithing perk). The Daedric Blue Weapons are blue and glow blue. They are made at a forge and uses the same recipe as vanilla Daedric, but uses Malachite ingots instead of Ebony Ingots.

2) Daedric Blue Weapons Replacer replaces the default Daedric weapons with a Blue variant that features a blue glow.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/qlgEgyn.png[/img]

I made this mod to accompany my Daedric Blue Light Armor / texture replacer. (I made the armor replacer for use in my mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18386]"A Friend of Time"[/url] which is now out and playable! Check it out!)

To grab the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3775]Daedric Blue Armor[/url] that goes along with these weapons, check it out [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3775]here.[/url]


Thank you!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/rU0sUyz.png[/img]

Merge the 'Data' folder with the 'Data' folder in your Skyrim folder.

[img]http://z13.invisionfree.com/IceburgsSkyrim/index.php?act=Attach&type=post&id=22002750[/img]

Uninstall: Datatexturesweaponsdaedric
And Datameshesweaponsdaedric

[img]http://i.imgur.com/vmReDuZ.png[/img]

None at this point.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/f3aBr68.png[/img]

author: Iceburg
